{"id":1097597107,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1699844482,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"57 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097597107/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Vowels in a String","memory":"13.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string sortVowels(string s) {\n        string res;\n        unordered_map<char,int>count;\n        for(auto c:s)\n        {\n            if(c == 'a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u' || c=='A' || c=='E' || c=='I'               || c=='O' || c=='U')\n            {\n                count[c]++;\n            }\n        }\n        string sortedvow = \"AEIOUaeiou\";\n        int j= 0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            char c = s[i];\n            if(c == 'a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u' || c=='A' || c=='E' || c=='I'               || c=='O' || c=='U')\n            {\n                while(count[sortedvow[j]]==0)\n                    j++;\n                res += sortedvow[j];\n                count[sortedvow[j]]--;\n            }\n            else\n                res+=c;\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-vowels-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
